00012 #define __AUDACITY_VIEWINFO__
00013 
00014 const double gMaxZoom = 6000000,
00015              gMinZoom = 0.001;
00016 
00017 class Track;
00018 
00019 struct ViewInfo {
00020 
00021    // Current selection (in seconds)
00022 
00023    double sel0;
00024    double sel1;
00025 
00026    // Scroll info
00027 
00028    Track *track;                // first visible track
00029    int vpos;                    // vertical scroll pos
00030 
00031    double h;                    // h pos in secs
00032    double screen;               // screen width in secs
00033    double total;                // total width in secs
00034    double zoom;                 // pixels per second
00035    double lastZoom;
00036 
00037    // Current horizontal scroll bar positions, in pixels
00038    wxInt64 sbarH;
00039    wxInt64 sbarScreen;
00040    wxInt64 sbarTotal;
00041    
00042    // Internal wxScrollbar positions are only int in range, so multiply
00043    // the above values with the following member to get the actual
00044    // scroll bar positions as reported by the horizontal wxScrollbar's members
00045    double sbarScale;
00046 
00047    // Vertical scroll step
00048    int scrollStep;
00049 
00050    // Other stuff, mainly states (true or false) related to autoscroll and
00051    // drawing the waveform. Maybe this should be put somewhere else?
00052 
00053    bool bRedrawWaveform;
00054    bool bUpdateTrackIndicator;
00055 
00056    bool bIsPlaying;
00057 };
00058 
00059 #endif
